mapper.select: SELECT ais.*, ais.is_enable enable, ais.is_completed completed FROM agile_issue_status ais WHERE ais.project_id = #{projectId} AND ais.status_id = #{statusId}

select t1.*, IFNULL(t2.is_completed, 0) as completed from fd_status t1 left join agile_issue_status t2 on (t2.project_id = #{projectId} and t1.id = t2.status_id ) where t1.organization_id = #{organizationId}

select fs.* from fd_status fs join agile_issue_status ais on fs.id = ais.status_id where ais.is_completed = 1 and ais.project_id in
#{projectId}

select fs.id, fs.name, fs.code, fs.description, fs.type, fs.object_version_number, ais.is_completed as completed from fd_status fs join agile_issue_status ais on (ais.project_id = #{projectId} and fs.id = ais.status_id) where fs.organization_id = #{organizationId} and fs.id in
#{statusId}
